school_name: Laguna College of Art and Design
comments: She uses powerpoint to give lectures, which makes it really clear and easy to take notes from. Her assignments aren\'t hard, and if you\'re paying attention in class, her tests aren\'t too extremely difficult either. Overall I felt like I learned a lot from this history class.

school_name: Laguna College of Art and Design
comments: Nicole is super nice, and her lectures are pretty thorough. She warns you what will on midterms/finals and she gives you decent time to finish assignments. I took her African class, her first take on the class, so she was a bit easier on us than her other classes. I learned a lot from her, and I really enjoyed the class.

school_name: Laguna College of Art and Design
comments: Easier class than I expected. She barely uses the textbook, everything you need to know for tests is on the lectures/powerpoints. Before big tests she gives a powerpoint with everything you need to study. Videos are interesting and projects are not huge.

school_name: Laguna College of Art and Design
comments: Great teacher! Very minimal use of the textbook - she makes a lecture outline available for students to print out. Only downsides are the group projects... they\'re due the last day of class when you have other finals to work on.

school_name: Laguna College of Art and Design
comments: one of my favoite classes and i don\'t even like history! I felt she understands students. She has great passion so the subjects are fun and all assignments are super clear, only a moron would not understand her expectations. Awesome teacher! homework made me do well on tests. super helpful with my questions.can\'t wait for ah 220 ;>

school_name: Laguna College of Art and Design
comments: Her class is a chance for her to know and control all. She is not helpful unless you are one of her favorites, i.e. ask useless questions about even more useless information. The assignments are a waste of time and the project is even moreso. She is a horrible teacher!!

school_name: Laguna College of Art and Design
comments: Sweetest teacher ever..:)makes the subject super interesting, teaches with a lot of enthusiasm and you actually remember stuff! very fun lectures and projects.
